H0.text: What is the name for a female peacock. Peafowl

H1.text: What is the name for a female peacock. Pavina

H2.text: What is the name for a female peacock. Peacine

H3.text: What is the name for a female peacock. Peahen

A4.text: Male peafowl are referred to as peacocks, and female peafowl are referred to as peahens.

A5.text: Female peafowl are referred to as peahens.
